GrantOrContributionPdDurYrGrp.GrantOrContributionPurposeTxt: AMERICAN SPIRIT BRIDGE AT THE NATIONAL WWII MUSEUM
IN HONOR OF LEE SCOTT/EAGLE FLIGHT SPONSORSHIP
IMPROVE COLLEGE ACCESS AND ATTAINMENT FOR RURAL STUDENTS
CAREERS IN BUSINESS: 50% BOOTH FUND, 50% TROTT FUND

DistributionFromCorpusElection.ElectionDesc: PURSUANT TO IRC SEC. 4942(H)(2) AND REG. 53.4942(A)-3(D)(2), THE ABOVE REFERENCED FOUNDATION HEREBY ELECTS TO TREAT CURRENT YEAR QUALIFYING DISTRIBUTIONS IN EXCESS OF THE IMMEDIATELY PRECEDING TAX YEAR'S UNDISTRIBUTED INCOME AS BEING MADE OUT OF CORPUS.

ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.PurposeOfGrantTxt: THE GRANT IS TO BE USED EXCLUSIVELY FOR THE ADVANCEMENT OF RURAL EDUCATION BY IMPROVING COLLEGE ACCESS AND ATTAINMENT AMONG RURAL HIGH SCHOOL AND COLLEGE STUDENTS, AS OUTLINED IN THE GRANT AGREEMENT DATED JULY 10, 2018.
ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.DatesOfReportsByGranteeTxt: NO REPORTS WERE DUE DURING THE FISCAL YEAR ENDING 8/31/2018
ExpenditureResponsibilityGrp.ResultsOfVerificationTxt: TO THE KNOWLEDGE OF THE FOUNDATION, NO PART OF THE GRANT HAS BEEN USED FOR ANYTHING OTHER THAN ITS INTENDED PURPOSE

InvestmentsOtherGrp.CategoryOrItemTxt: BDT CAPITAL PARTNERS FUND CBI I-A
BDT CAPITAL PARTNERS ANNEX FUND I-A
